name: Nibiruman:2080
description:
You possess superhuman power.Your mission is to to stop the Nibiruman, and save the last humans.

Controls

  • WASD / Arrow Keys :movement
  • Mouse:HOLD LEFT TO SHOOT
  • Mouse:HOLD RIGHT TO DASH AND SMASH
Instruction
  • Saving a last human makes the shot stronger for a while.
  • DASH AND SMASH has a very high attack power. Some enemies have attributes that make them weak to DASH AND SMASH.
  • A SMASH occurs when a wall is reflected during a dash.
  • Taking an energy dot will multiply your score and reduce the difficulty.
Features
  • intense arcade-style shooter.
  • Lots of bullets and enemies.
  • Replay function of previous game.
Nibiruman:2080

The game was created for TIC-80 fantasy console. Check the full source code on GitHub.

Influences
  • Robotron 2084, Smash T.V., geometry wars, Waves.
